title: Can I abort a 7-month-old baby? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why would you do that in the first place? and no- 7 month old is a baby fully grown - if you don’t want to keep the baby I wouldn’t ask for reasons - I would still suggest there are couples who can’t have a baby because of health problems and others - they would be more than happy to adopt ! Try ( motherhood is magical) if you can’t keep the baby atleast look for other sources.
